name: DocumentStateChanged
doc: Schema belongs to API DocumentSigningEvents.v1. Schema represents an event of changing the state of document within ePodpisy application.

fields.name: occurredOn
fields.doc: Date and time when event occurred.

fields.name: documentExternalId
fields.doc: Externally defined unique identifier of document within ePodpisy.

fields.name: state
fields.doc: Current runtime state of the document within ePodpisy.

fields.name: previousState
fields.doc: Previous runtime state of the document within ePodpisy.
